Website Graphic Designer October 2022 - Present

Ecreativeworks

  • Led design efforts for all client websites, enhanced user experience and increased client satisfaction rate
  • Designed interactive prototypes that facilitated more effective collaboration with clients, which led to user-focused products
  • Conducted client interviews to research optimal user flows for their customers
  • Organized bi-weekly meetings to continually review and refine design style
